name: Argo (itch) (Philisoft Studio)
description:
~ ARGO ~
AN ANCIENT FERRY SHIP VINTAGE GAME

Made for the MonoGame Jam 4 - Upgrade

~ THE GAME ~

You own a small FERRY SHIP BUSINESS that aims to be the best choice among the citizens who need to TRIP ACROSS the dangerous AEGIS SEA!

                                 

~ CONTROLS ~

  • Use your ARROW Keys or WASD Keys to move the ship
  • Z Key orders for HALTING the ship.  
  • SPACE Key can be used when prompted
  • ESCAPE Key quits game                  

                            

~ DANGERS ~

Beware for DANGERS and MONSTERS as they can SINK your ship when its Hitpoints hits 0!

  • RED SERPENTS inflict 30 of damage .
  • MAELSTROMS pull the ship until damaging 15 Hitpoints.
  • Whenever your ship SINKS, you must PAY 127 COINS!
                                

~ UPGRADE YOUR SHIP ~

Each TURN of MONTH you can buy UPGRADES for your ship. The Upgrade Menu is shown among the screenshots.

~ VICTORY / DEFEAT ~

You receive coins by efficiency.  So avoid all dangers and cross the Aegis Sea as fast as you can. If you go bankrupt, it's Game over! Otherwise, if your business manages to SUCCEED with NO negative wealth for SIX MONTHS, YOU WIN!

~ OBS. ~

  1. The Game does not have a save system
  2. The Game can only be played in the windowed mode (for now)
